name: butter tarts
directions: Place the mini tart shells in a mini cupcake tray (usually these trays only hold 24, so I put the last 6 in a regular cupcake tray and it works well).
Mix butter, brown sugar, corn syrup and salt in a large bowl.
Whisk in eggs and vanilla; the batter will be very liquid.
Pour carefully into tart shells. Sprinkle on chopped pecans if using.
Bake for 20 minutes. They will puff up a lot in the oven, don`t worry, they will sink back after they come out of the oven and cool down.
Let them cool for at least 10 minutes and enjoy!
notes: don't worry if they puff up significantly during baking; that's part of the process.
